title: Captain Fortune and her first mate, Corsair Quinn!

embed.description: Livestream 0909 9.5hrs ARRRRRRGGGGGGGG! SHOW ME TEH BOOTY~ Streaming on Twitch at: www.twitch.tv/monorirogue/ Hope to see you there! FB Fan Page at: www... Captain Miss Fortune x Corsair Quinn

body: Just between you and me, I think Quinn got a little bustier ever since she joined up. XD

replies.body: This is _awesome_.  Excellent work - the background in particular is very evocative.

Hey, silly question: what do you think MF eats to get so big?

Do you think she suggested it to Quinn? ;)

EDIT: Just to note, it's not my artwork. I just found it on Deviantart.
@BIOLUMINESCENSE on the quinn update, also update her chest size :)
I think Ironstylus said they deliberately made sure Quinn was flat-chested to make her seem more boyish.

And then Woad Scout Quinn all of a sudden.
That's why I bought Phoenix Quinn instead. Also she pretti c:

Dang man this is awesome!

You don't see much {{champion:133}}  fan art, so it's really awesome that they picked her out of all the new Bilgewater skins! 

But yeah, I don't really get why they keep on sexualizing {{champion:133}}...

Because canon Quinn is a serious person, so you gotta sexualise her in skins in order to reach the valueless majority :D.
Saddening.

I love MF & Quinn :D
Really cool artwork. My only complaint are the gun barrels being so centered and demanding the viewers eye first, it's kind of distracting.
Really? I find MF's cleavage more demanding of attention. XD
From a design point of view, 3 fairly large black circle in the center of the image will draw a viewers eye in.
But what about the slaughter fleet?! Are Quinn's loyalties so flexible as that?!

Very cool work man, I really liked it :)

Quinn main here
